name: Uzumaki Naruto
description: Using his signature move, Shadow Clones, Naruto is able to perform powerful moves such as the Uzumaki Naruto Combo and Rasengan.

skills.name: Shadow Clones
skills.description: Naruto makes mutliple shadow clones hiding his true body. During this time, all damage done to Naruto has a 50 percent reduction. This effect lasts 4 rounds.

skills.name: Uzumaki Naruto Combo
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to a single opponent. Requires Shadow clones.

skills.name: Rasengan
skills.description: Deals 45 damage to a single opponent, and the target is unable to perform a skill for 1 round. Requires Shadow Clones.

skills.name: Sexy Technique
skills.description: Makes Uzumaki Naruto invulnerable for the next round.

name: Haruno Sakura
description: Due to her recent training as a medical ninja with Tsunade, Sakura is now able to deliver powerful punches and heal her teammates.

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: Sakura goes on a rampage, improving her K.O. Punch by 200 percent and taking 50 percent less damage for the upcoming 5 rounds.

skills.name: KO Punch
skills.description: Deals 15 damage and knocks the target unconscious leaving the target unable to perform a skill for 1 round.

skills.name: Cure
skills.description: Sakura cures a teammember for 30 health points.

skills.name: Sakura Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Haruno Sakura invulnerable for the next round.

name: Uchiha Sasuke
description: The sole survivor of the Uchiha clan massacre. Using his sharingan, Sasuke is able to anticipate incoming attacks and is capable of advanced offensive moves.

skills.name: Sasuke Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Uchiha Sasuke invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Sharingan
skills.description: Sasuke activates his sharingan, all damage versus Sasuke is reduced by 50 percent. Lasts 4 rounds.

skills.name: Chidori
skills.description: Deals 60 damage to the target. Requires sharingan to perform.

skills.name: Lion Combo
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to the target.

name: Haku
description: Haku is the sole survivor of his clan and is the subordinate of Momochi Zabuza. His bloodline ability allows him to potentially disable and attack all his enemies.

skills.name: Water Needles
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to the target(s). This skill becomes area of effect when Demonic Ice Mirrors is activated.

skills.name: Acupuncture
skills.description: Puts the target(s) in a coma leaving the target(s) unable to perform a skill for 2 rounds. This skill becomes area of effect when Demonic Ice Mirrors is activated.

skills.name: Demonic Ice Mirrors
skills.description: Haku creates Demonic Ice Mirrors for 3 rounds. During this time, Water Needles and Acupuncture become area of effect and Haku becomes invulnerable.

skills.name: Mirror Transfer
skills.description: Makes Shiro Haku invulnerable for the next round.

name: Rock Lee
description: Lee is a Taijutsu specialist. Under the study of Maito Gai he has learned how to open his chakra gates, vastly increasing the strength of his lotus technique.

skills.name: Drunken Fist Style Taijutsu
skills.description: Starting this turn, Lee deals 45 damage to a single opponent over three rounds. During this time, all damage done to Lee is reduced by 66 percent.

skills.name: 5th Gate Opening
skills.description: Improves lotus to a total of 400 percent damage, and makes Lee invulnerable for the upcoming two rounds. Lee looses 80 percent of his current health.

skills.name: Lotus
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to an opponent (Please note that this skill does 120 damage when 5th Gate Opening is in effect).

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Makes Rock Lee invulnerable for the next round.

name: Tenten
description: Tenten is a true weapon master. Within seconds, she can throw hundreds of projectiles at one or more targets without a single miss.

skills.name: Summoning Twin Rising Dragons
skills.description: Tenten prepares for her attacks. Lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to all enemy targets. Requires Summoning Twin Rising Dragons.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons Trap
skills.description: Traps the entire enemy team for one round and damages the team for 5 damage. Requires Summoning Twin Rising Dragons.

skills.name: Tenten Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Tenten invulnerable for the next round.

name: Hyuuga Neji
description: Neji is the most talented member of the Hyuuga clan. Being a super genius, he was able to master his Byakugan and the fighting style Gentle Fist all by himself.

skills.name: Gentle Fist Taijutsu
skills.description: Neji attacks his opponent for 2 rounds, dealing 20 damage per round.

skills.name: Eight Trigram Palms Heavenly Spin
skills.description: This skill deals 15 damage to all enemies and makes Hyuuga Neji invulnerable for one round.

skills.name: Eight Trigram Sixty-Four Palms Technique
skills.description: Neji closes all of his opponents chakra points. The target loses 5 chakra and is unable to defend for one round.

skills.name: Neji Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Hyuuga Neji invulnerable for the next round.

name: Gaara of the Desert
description: Gaara has the demon Shukaku within him, which enables him to use sand for fighting. This sand can either form an ultimate defence or kill an opponent instantly.

skills.name: Armor of Sand
skills.description: Gaara activates his armor of sand, all damage versus Gaara is reduced by 75 percent. Lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Desert Coffin
skills.description: When the target is in Desert Coffin, he is unable to defend or use a skill for two round. Desert Coffin enables Desert Graveyard on the target.

skills.name: Desert Graveyard
skills.description: Instantly kills the target. Requires Desert Coffin on this target.

skills.name: Sand Shield
skills.description: Makes Gaara of the Desert invulnerable for the next round.

name: Inuzuka Kiba
description: Kiba is a member of the Inuzuka clan, which uses dogs in battle. He can fuse with his dog Akamaru to become extremely powerful.

skills.name: Dynamic Air marking
skills.description: Kiba marks all enemies, enabling Double Headed Wolf. Air marking lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Double Headed Wolf
skills.description: Deals 60 damage to all marked opponents and heals 15 health over three rounds. Kiba cannot be attacked during this time.

skills.name: Garouga
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to a single opponent. When Double Headed Wolf is in effect, Garouga deals 60 damage. Can only target enemies who are marked.

skills.name: Smokebomb
skills.description: Makes Kiba invulnerable for the next round.

name: Hyuuga Hinata
description: Hinata is a shy girl that doubts her own powers and potential. Only recently, she developed a new fighting style that involves extremely precise chakra control.

skills.name: Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hinata attacks a single target for 2 rounds, dealing 20 damage and removing 2 chakra per round. Requires Byakugan.

skills.name: Byakugan
skills.description: Enables Hinata to use her techniques. The effect lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Attack of the Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: Deals 25 damage to all enemy targets. During the next round, all damage done to your team is reduced by 50 percent. Requires Byakugan.

skills.name: Protection of the Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: Makes Hinata invulnerable during the next round.

name: Aburame Shino
description: Shino is the successor of the Aburame clan, which uses bugs for fighting. These bugs can be used to leach chakra or defend the entire team.

skills.name: Chakra Leach
skills.description: Shino uses his bugs to steal chakra from the enemy. Every target that has a bug on him/her gets 10 damage and 1 chakra drained.

skills.name: Bug Clone
skills.description: Makes Aburame Shino invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Female Bug
skills.description: Place a bug on single enemy target.

skills.name: Bug Wall
skills.description: The whole team becomes invulnerable for the upcoming 2 rounds.

name: Kankuro
description: Kankuro is a master puppeteer, and uses only puppets for fighting. His puppets can deal damage as well as poison enemies.

skills.name: Puppet Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Kankuro invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Puppet Preparation
skills.description: Kankuro prepares his puppets for attack. Lasts 5 rounds.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: Requires Puppet Preparation. Deals 40 damage to all opponents over 4 rounds. This damage cannot be defended against once in effect.

skills.name: Black Secret Technique Machine One Shot
skills.description: Deals 60 damage to the target. Requires Puppet Preparation.

name: Nara Shikamaru
description: Shikamaru is the smartest ninja in Konoha. As a member of the Nara clan, he can control shadows and use them to capture and damage the enemy.

skills.name: Meditate
skills.description: Shikamaru thinks up a strategy. The tecnique stays active for 4 rounds.

skills.name: Shadow Bind
skills.description: Captures the enemy team making them unable to perform a skill for two rounds and boosts the damage of Neck Bind by 100 percent. Requires Meditate.

skills.name: Shadow Neck Bind
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to a single opponent and disables their defence. Requires Meditate.

skills.name: Shikamaru Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Shikamaru invulnerable for the next round.

name: Yamanaka Ino
description: Ino, as a member of the Yamanaka clan, can control the minds of others. She can either enter minds, or disrupt a persons movements.

skills.name: Change of Heart
skills.description: Ino takes over the mind of an opponent. During this time the target can not be defended or preform a skill. The technique lasts three rounds.

skills.name: Art of the Valentine
skills.description: Requires Change of Heart. Performs a simple attack with the controlled body. The attack deals 25 damage to the enemy.

skills.name: Mind Body Disturbance Technique
skills.description: The target will attack a random enemy teammate for 25 damage. This damage can not be defended. During this time he is not able to preform a skill or be defended.

skills.name: Ino Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Ino invulnerable for the next round.

name: Akimichi Chouji
description: Chouji is a member of the Akimichi clan. With his clans special food pills and multi-size techniques, he can do some serious damage.

skills.name: Chouji Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Chouji invulnerable to damage for this round.

skills.name: Akimichi Pills
skills.description: Boosts Chouji his attacks with 100 percent damage for the rest of the game. Chouji receives 20 damage for each pill taken. Three pills can be taken max.

skills.name: Meat Tank
skills.description: Chouji transforms into a Meat Tank for 2 rounds, attacking a single opponent dealing 10 damage each round. During this time, Chouji is invulnerable to damage.

skills.name: Partial Double Size Technique
skills.description: Deals 20 damage to the target.

name: Temari
description: Temari is the elder sister of Gaara and Kankuro. She uses a giant fan as her main weapon to do powerful long ranged attacks.

skills.name: Cutting Whirlwind
skills.description: Deals 25 damage to all enemy targets.

skills.name: Dust Wind
skills.description: The whole team becomes invulnerable for the upcoming 2 rounds.

skills.name: Summoning Quick Beheading Dance
skills.description: Deals 35 damage to all enemy targets.

skills.name: Fan Defence Technique
skills.description: Makes Temari invulnerable for the next round.

name: Jiroubou
description: Jiroubou is the largest member of the Sound four. His fighting style involves powerful physical attacks in combination with manipulation of earth.

skills.name: Nirvana Fist Style Taijutsu
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to a single opponent.

skills.name: Earth Seal Mud Cannonball
skills.description: Deals 20 damage to all opponents.

skills.name: Dungeon Chamber of Nothingness
skills.description: Jiroubou captures the enemy team in a prison of earth. Jiroubou steals two chakra from an opponent and his entire team is invulnerable for one round.

skills.name: Earth Wall Land Flip
skills.description: Makes Jiroubou Invulnerable for the next round.

name: Kidoumaru
description: Kidoumaru has spider-like skills. He has 6 arms and has the ability to create weapons and traps with a strange golden web-like liquid.

skills.name: Summoning Kyodaigumo
skills.description: Summons the spider Kyodaigumo creating a massive amount of small spiders dealing 10 damage to all enemies for 5 rounds. Kidoumaru takes 33 percent less damage.

skills.name: Spider Web
skills.description: Traps a single target for two turns, making him unable to perform a skill.

skills.name: Golden Arrow
skills.description: Deals 50 damage to a single opponent.

skills.name: Golden Armor
skills.description: Makes Kidoumaru invulnerable during the next round.

name: Tayuya
description: Tayuyas only weapon is a flute, on which she can cast Genjutsu or control three summoned demons, The Doki.

skills.name: Summoning the Doki
skills.description: Summons the Doki demons. Deals 15 damage to each opponent for 2 rounds and reduces the damage done to Tayuya by 33 percent. Cannot be used during DFI.

skills.name: Doki Chakra Ghosts
skills.description: This skill removes 1 chakra and does 5 damage to an enemy target affected by Doki Summons.

skills.name: Demonic Flute Illusion
skills.description: Puts the enemy team under genjutsu using a flute making them unable to perform a skill for two rounds. Cannot be used during Summoning the Doki.

skills.name: Doki Defence
skills.description: Makes Tayuya invulneravle for the next round.

name: Sakon
description: Sakon usually carries a strange head around on his back. This head turns out to be his brother Ukon, who can also exit Sakon and enter other bodies in order to destroy them.

skills.name: Rest
skills.description: Heals 35 health and removes Parasite Demon Technique.

skills.name: Gattling Punch
skills.description: Deals 40 damage to the target. Deals 20 damage during Parasite Demon technique.

skills.name: Parasite Demon Technique
skills.description: Fuses Ukons body with an enemy target. Each turn, the target receives an undefendable 15 damage. The technique ends when the target is killed or Sakon dies.

skills.name: Summoning Rashoumon
skills.description: Makes Sakon invulnerable during the next round. Can?t be used during Parasite Demon Technique.

name: Momochi Zabuza
description: Zabuza is a missing-nin from the Hidden Mist Village. He is a frightening opponent attacking his enemies out of the fog he creates.

skills.name: Water Clone Zabuza
skills.description: Makes Momochi Zabuza invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Silent Homicide Technique
skills.description: Zabuza deals 30 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Great Waterfall Technique
skills.description: Zabuza knocks all of his opponents down with a giant wave of water, doing 10 damage to each target and leaving them unable to perform a skill for one round.

skills.name: Hidden Mist Technique
skills.description: Zabuza creates a mist for 2 rounds, leaving the entire enemy team unable to defend. Zabuza takes 50 percent less damage during this time and Homicide Technique does double damage.

name: Kaguya Kimimaro
description: One of Orochimarus top ninjas, Kimimaro has very strong offensive abilities but his disease is slowly killing him.

skills.name: Dance of the Seedling Fern
skills.description: Kaguya Kimimaro creates a forest of sharp bones. All enemies take 40 damage and Kaguya Kimimaro loses 30 health over 3 rounds.

skills.name: Dance of the Clematis
skills.description: This skill does 45 damage to one opponent and they are unable to perform a skill for one round. Kimimaro loses 20 health over 2 rounds.

skills.name: Dance of the Camellia
skills.description: Kaguya Kimimaro uses his superior taijustu and arm bones as a sword. This skill does 30 damage to one enemy and Kaguya Kimimaru loses 10 health.

skills.name: Bone Masks
skills.description: Makes Kaguya Kimimaro invulnerable for the next round.

name: Shizune
description: Shizune is the aid of Tsunade. A competent combatant using poisons and needles, she is also a highly skilled medic who is able to heal her allies.

skills.name: Prepared Needle Shot
skills.description: Shizune shoots hidden needles at an opponent doing 15 damage to them.

skills.name: Poison Mist
skills.description: Shizune breaths a poison cloud on an enemy. The target loses 10 health for 3 rounds. The damage cannot avoided and it cannot be used on a poisoned target.

skills.name: Healing Resuscitation Regeneration
skills.description: Shizune heals an ally for 50 health points.

skills.name: Shizune Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Shizune invulnerable for the next round.

name: Yakushi Kabuto
description: Kabuto was once found on the battlefield, was taught medical ninjutsu, and now assists Orochimaru. He uses his medical skill for both offence and defense.

skills.name: Mystical Palm Technique
skills.description: Yakushi Kabuto attacks one enemy cutting through their flesh like a scalpel doing 15 damage to the opponent and removing one chakra.

skills.name: Temple of Nirvana
skills.description: When Yakushi Kabuto uses this technique all enemies are unable to properly defend themselves for the next four rounds.

skills.name: Secret Healing Wound Destruction
skills.description: After using this skill Kabuto heals 15 health points for the next five rounds.

skills.name: Dead Soul Technique
skills.description: Makes Yakushi Kabuto invulnerable in the next round.

name: Yuhi Kurenai
description: Yuhi Kurenai is a jounin and team leader of Hinata, Shino and Kiba. She is a genjutsu master who is able to both disable and attack her enemies with illusions.

skills.name: Cherry Blossom Suffocation
skills.description: Suffocated by illusionary cherry blossoms, the target loses 40 health and is unable to use a skill for 1 round. Allows use of Plant Form Attack on target.

skills.name: Vanishing Illusion
skills.description: Makes Kurenai invulnerable for one turn.

skills.name: Tree Bind Death
skills.description: Bound by an illusion the target is unable to use a skill and defend. This effect lasts 2 rounds. Allows Cherry Blossom Suffication and Plant Form Attack on target.

skills.name: Plant Form Attack
skills.description: Yuri Kurenai attacks her trapped foe doing 20 damage and destroying one chakra.

name: Sarutobi Asuma
description: Sarutobi Asuma is the leader of Team 10. He uses trench knives extended by his chakra to fight and protect his teammates.

skills.name: Flying Swallow
skills.description: Using blades with wind chakra to fight, Asuma and his allies take 50 percent less damage and all opponents take 15 damage for 2 rounds.

skills.name: Asuma Replacement Technique
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma is invunerable for one round when he uses this skill.

skills.name: Finishing Blow
skills.description: The final move of his Flying Swallow technique, Asuma does 30 damage to all enemies and destroys one chakra per target. Flying Swallow must be in effect.

skills.name: Self-Sacrifice
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma protects an ally from harm. Asuma loses 15 health and both the target ally and Asuma are invulnerable for one round.

name: Maito Gai
description: Gai is the sensei of Lee, Tenten and Neji. He and Lee both use the same fighting style, Strong Fist, which involves high-speed attacks and the openning of inner chakra gates.

skills.name: Strong Whirlwind
skills.description: Gai kicks with a strong whirlwind hitting an opponent and doing 30 damage. The damage is unaffected by damage reducing skills.

skills.name: 6th Gate Opening
skills.description: Gai opens 6 chakra gates for 2 rounds. He loses half his current health but Strong Whirlwind does double damage and he is invulnerable for 2 rounds.

skills.name: Counter Punch
skills.description: For the next 3 rounds Gai has a 50% chance of negating any offensive skills used against him and doing 30 damage to the enemy who targeted him.

skills.name: Gai Replacement Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Gai invulnerable for one round.

name: Hatake Kakashi
description: Kakashi is the sensei of Naruto, Sakura, and Sasuke. With his Sharingan he is able to turn his foes skills back upon themselves and can cause severe damage with his Raikiri and Nin-Dogs skills.

skills.name: Kakashi Replacement Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Kakashi invulnerable for one round.

skills.name: Nin-Dogs
skills.description: Kakashi summons the nin-dogs. The dogs bite the target leaving it unable to perform a skill for 1 round.

skills.name: Raikiri
skills.description: A skill so strong it is said to cut lightning. This skill does 55 damage to a target or instantly kills them if they are effected by Nin-Dogs.

skills.name: Sharingan Copy
skills.description: Secretly targeting an opponent, Kakashi will copy a skill they use for one round. Offensive skills are negated and skills with bloodline are immune.

name: Jiraiya
description: Jiraiya is one of the Legendary Sannin. With his various frog-based jutsus he is able to both hinder and damage all of his opponents.

skills.name: Toad Mouth Bind
skills.description: Jiraiya places his enemies in a giant toad stomach. While his opponents are able to act, they are unable to harm Jiraiya and his team for the next 2 rounds.

skills.name: Major Summoning Gamabunta
skills.description: Gamabunta is summoned. Jiraiya takes 75 percent less damage and enemies are unable to defend for four rounds. One major summon may be used per team.

skills.name: Spiked Buddha
skills.description: Makes Jiraiya invunrable for the next round.

skills.name: Great Fireball Technique
skills.description: Jiraiya spits a giant fireball at all enemies doing 15 damage. This damage is doubled when Gamabunta is summoned.

name: Tsunade
description: Tsunade is the Godaime Hokage and a Legendary Sannin. Her skill with medical ninjutsu allows her to do significant damage and heal herself and teammates.

skills.name: Creation Rebirth
skills.description: Using stored chakra, Tsunade regenerates for the next three rounds. She heals 100 health in the first, 50 health in the second, and 25 health in the third.

skills.name: Tsunade Replacement Technique
skills.description: Makes Tsunade invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Major Summoning Katsuyu
skills.description: Tsunade summons the slug queen Katsuyu. Katsuyu fully heals her team and makes them invulnerable for two rounds. One major summon may be used per team.

skills.name: Painful Sky Leg
skills.description: With her insane strength, Tsunade performs a drop kick on one enemy dealing 20 damage and leaving them unable to use a skill for one round.

name: Orochimaru
description: Orochimaru is one of the Legendary Sannin. He can increase his teams chakra for a price and summon powerful snakes to beat his enemies.

skills.name: Kusanagi
skills.description: Orochimaru pulls the legendary sword from his stomach and swiftly stabs his opponent. The target takes 35 damage and loses 1 chakra.

skills.name: Cursed Seal Technique
skills.description: Orochimaru places a cursed seal on one ally who takes 10 damage but gains one extra chakra each round. This effect is permanent and can only be used once.

skills.name: Earth Clone Technique
skills.description: Makes Orochimaru invulnerable for the next round.

skills.name: Major Summoning Manda
skills.description: The snake king Manda is summoned. Manda kills one enemy and gives Orochimaru 3 chakra. One major summon may be used per team.

name: Sandaime Hokage
description: Sandaime Hokage, known as the God of Shinobi, was the strongest Kage to ever live. He is able to concentrate on one opponent while his summon, Enma, confronts others. When all else fails he can summon the death god.

skills.name: Fire Dragon Flame Missile
skills.description: Sandaime Hokage deals 30 damage immediately to a target and makes the character burn for an extra 10 damage for the round after. All damage is unavoidable.

skills.name: Major Summoning Enma
skills.description: Sandaime summons Enma to protect his team. For 5 rounds all team members cannot go below 1 health point by enemy hands. One major summon may be used per team.

skills.name: Shiki Fuujin
skills.description: Sandaime summons the death god, sacrificing himself to kill one opponent. The target of this skill dies instantly and Sandaime is also killed.

skills.name: Earth Release Wall
skills.description: Makes Sandaime invulnerable for the next round.
